content: ## sade placemats ## easy pattern to follow for the beginner to experienced crocheter cotton yarn is perfect for these placemats size the diameter of the placemats you get by following this pattern will be about 31 cm 12 with size e / 3 5 mm hook one placemat takes about 70 g yarn if you want bigger placemats use size g / 4 mm hook this is a written pattern it is written with us terms share your picture on ig #sadeplacemats terms and conditions https //tiitunlabra com/tietoja/
